name: A Chill Intoxicating Drive
description:
Drive through a synthwave city in the future of 199x.
Chill. Paint the city. Cause mischief.

A game by Starcat
Title background by Hoot

Ink System by Inkle Studios
Music by TRWorkshop, Sound effects by Dustyroom

Created during GameDev.tv Jam 22 (20-31 May 2022)

... to be continued.

If you like this rough preview, you can support the project on Patreon: http://pat.starcat-dev.de

Thank you for playing.
